entry.title: CocoaHeads August 2010 Meeting Agenda
entry.content:
Next CocoaHeads meeting will be Thursday, August 12th at Indy Hall.

We have an exciting meeting this month, with several presenters on varied topics. Also, it's PhillyCocoa's 2nd birthday!

Please RSVP for the August 2010 meeting for a chance to win a free Cocoa programming related book from Pearson Technology..

Agenda

  • Meet & Greet - Communicate with other humans using the high bandwidth "face-to-face" protocol.
  • General News
    • Voices that Matter Conference
    • "Sprint Club" Update
  • Lineup
    • Mike Zornek's "Pokemon App"
    • Joe Ibanez's media sharing app
    • Kevin Lee on "Core Data, You're Doin it Wrong"
    • Corey Floyd explains "Why my block-based URL manager is better than Allum's"

entry.title: CocoaHeads July 2010 Meeting Agenda
entry.content:
Next CocoaHeads meeting will be Thursday, July 8th at Indy Hall.

This month, we'll still be unpacking information from WWDC. Topics on the agenda are AVFoundation, as well as some discussion of new development tools. Also, we'll take a look back at the Philly Beer Week app, some lessons learned, and some directions moving forward.

As PhillyCocoa expands, it will be helpful to us and our hosts, Indy Hall to get a rough head count for each meeting.

Please RSVP for the July 2010 meeting.

Agenda

  • Meet & Greet - Communicate with other humans using the high bandwidth "face-to-face" protocol.
  • General News
    • Voices that Matter Conference
    • Sprints & Umbrellas
  • Show & Tell
  • Minitalks

entry.title: CocoaHeads June 2010 Meeting Agenda
entry.content:
Next CocoaHeads meeting will be Thursday, June 17th at Indy Hall.

June looks like a great meeting. Those who attended WWDC will share their experiences and key take-aways. Also, the release of iOS 4 to the general public is right around the corner. Learn what you need to do to prepare your app.

Agenda

  • Meet & Greet - Communicate with other humans using the high bandwidth "face-to-face" protocol.
  • General News
  • Show & Tell
  • WWDC & iOS 4

entry.title: CocoaHeads May 2010 Meeting Agenda
entry.content:
Next CocoaHeads meeting will be Thursday, May 13th at Indy Hall.

WWDC is coming up, and the release of iPhone OS 4 is right around the corner. This month we'll be talking about "new stuff" that may or may not be related to the aformentioned iPhone OS release.

There is still space for another mini-talk if you also want to share some "new stuff".

Agenda

  • Meet & Greet - Communicate with other humans using the high bandwidth "face-to-face" protocol.
  • General News
  • Show & Tell
  • Minitalks
    • New Audio Stuff - Andy Mroczkowski
    • New Motion-y Stuff - Corey Floyd

entry.title: CocoaHeads April 2010 Meeting Agenda
entry.content:
Next CocoaHeads meeting will be Thursday, April 8th at Indy Hall.

The iPad has shipped, and iPhone OS will have been just announced -- it's a great time to be a Cocoa Developer!

Agenda

  • Meet & Greet - Communicate with other humans using the high bandwidth "face-to-face" protocol.
  • General News
  • Show & Tell
  • Minitalks
    • CoreText on iPad - Jake O'Brien
    • Optimizing the Philly Beer Week app with Instruments - Michael James
    • Core Data Threading and Performance Techniques - Andy Mroczkowski
